page.title: 13THE INDUSTRIAL ESTATE
page.content: { The Industrial estate of Ponteland is not very large.It consists of five factories:Dobsons sweet factory, Lawsons Fuses,MacDonald's Printing Factory,Manners for Meat and Maysan's Foods.Each of the employed in these factories work on average{40 hours}per week.The average amount of people is approximately{55}in each factory. There is also an auction room and a {cattle mart}on this site.The auction room is open on a Wednesday for people to bring their goods,but the auction day is on a Thursday starting at 10.30 am.The cattle mart is open on a Monday prospective buyers have to sign in at the secretary's desk before 10.30 am. At this time the cows are being auctioned off and at 12.30pm.they start to sell some of the sheep.The auction is usually completely finished by 2.30 in the afternoon.
